transcript: the problem is what do you do when you're at zero when you're like I'm not confident I haven't done anything good all you have to do is chunk down let's be real what did I do today that was good well I woke up I got out of bed I showed up to work on time okay so I'm punctual I respond to things pretty quick okay so I'm responsible and then those become things that you can stack on top of one another my goal in life has always been to stack as much proof as I possibly can to support that I am who I say
